enter_email_to_recover: Please enter e-mail to recover your account
recover_email_sent: Your recover mail sent please check your email!
mail_not_sent: If you did not receive the password reset email:
mail_not_sent_reason_1: It may take up to 10 minutes for the password reset email to arrive.
mail_not_sent_reason_2: Check your spam and other e-mail boxes.
mail_not_sent_reason_3: Check that the e-mail address you entered is correct.
